title: How to Make 8 Desserts in 1 Pan

steps.title: Cream butter and sugar.
steps.content: Cream butter and sugar. Combine the butter and sugar in a mixing bowl and cream, using an electric mixer or wooden spoon until fluffy and very light. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Beat in eggs and vanilla.
steps.content: Beat in eggs and vanilla. Add the egg and vanilla to the mixture, and beat in. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Fold in the dry ingredients.
steps.content: Fold in the dry ingredients. Add in the flour, salt and baking soda, and fold in using a spatula. [3] X Research source Finish mixing with your hands. This should form a soft dough that is not sticky to the touch. If the cookie dough is too sticky to handle, add in additional flour, 1 tablespoon at a time.

steps.title: Fold in chocolate chips.
steps.content: Fold in chocolate chips. Add the chocolate chips to the dough, folding well to distribute.

steps.title: Divide the dough equally into two bowls.
steps.content: Divide the dough equally into two bowls.

steps.title: Mix the M&Ms into one bowl.
steps.content: Mix the M&Ms into one bowl. Add the M&Ms to one of bowls and, using your hands, mix in. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Set aside both the doughs.
steps.content: Set aside both the doughs.

steps.title: Prepare the brownie mix.
steps.content: Prepare the brownie mix. Combine the brownie mix with egg, oil and water. [5] X Research source This should form a very thick batter that is only slightly softer than cookie dough. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Set aside.
steps.content: Set aside.

steps.title: Line a baking sheet.
steps.content: Line a baking sheet. Use the paper towels to line the baking sheet.

steps.title: Chop the apple.
steps.content: Chop the apple. Core the apple and roughly chop them into pieces. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Transfer to the prepared baking sheet and fold the towel in half.
steps.content: Transfer to the prepared baking sheet and fold the towel in half. Set aside for 1 hour. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Combine the dry ingredients.
steps.content: Combine the dry ingredients. Put the sugar, cinnamon and flour in a bowl and mix to combine. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Coat apple pieces in sugar mixture.
steps.content: Coat apple pieces in sugar mixture. Add the apple pieces, and mix using your hands to coat. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Set aside.
steps.content: Set aside.

steps.title: Whisk the egg and sugars.
steps.content: Whisk the egg and sugars. Put the egg and sugars in a mixing bowl and whisk until smooth. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Mix in other ingredients.
steps.content: Mix in other ingredients. Add the pumpkin purée, cream, vanilla and mixed spice, whisking until combined. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Set aside.
steps.content: Set aside.

steps.title: Cream butter and sugar.
steps.content: Cream butter and sugar. Combine the butter and sugar in a mixing bowl and cream, using an electric mixer or wooden spoon until fluffy and very light. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Combine in other ingredients.
steps.content: Combine in other ingredients. Add the egg, flour, baking powder, and mashed banana, beating until smooth. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Set aside.
steps.content: Set aside.

steps.title: Combine all ingredients until smooth.
steps.content: Combine all ingredients until smooth. Put both cheeses, the eggs, flour, and sugar, in a bowl, and mix to combine. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Set aside.
steps.content: Set aside.

steps.title: Preheat the oven to 150°C (300°F).
steps.content: Preheat the oven to 150°C (300°F). [1] X Research source [4] X Research source

steps.title: Line baking paper and annotate.
steps.content: Line baking paper and annotate. Cut baking paper into a rectangle the size of your baking pan. Use a pencil and ruler to divide the paper into 8 equal sections—halved length-wise and quartered width-wise, as in the layout diagram. Annotate the sections as shown in the diagram above.

steps.title: Grease and line baking sheet.
steps.content: Grease and line baking sheet. Use butter or oil spray to grease the baking pan, and line with the annotated paper. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Mold and align cookie doughs.
steps.content: Mold and align cookie doughs. Shape both cookie doughs into rectangles measuring 4½×6½ inches (11.5×16.5 cm). Align the doughs with their respective sections. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make walls with graham crackers.
steps.content: Make walls with graham crackers. Break the graham crackers into smaller rectangles. Place them, on edge, along the borders of the s'mores section, pressing them against the cookie doughs for support. You are essentially making walls to hold in the s'mores section. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make s'mores section.
steps.content: Make s'mores section. Place two graham crackers on the bottom of the s'mores section to create the base. Distribute the chocolate on top, then sprinkle with the marshmallows. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add brownie batter section.
steps.content: Add brownie batter section. Spread brownie batter over its respective section. [1] X Research source It should be stiff enough to hold its shape. Using your wet hands or a spatula, gently press the right wall of batter to correctly align it with the right wall of the M&Ms cookie dough.

steps.title: Make base for pie fillings.
steps.content: Make base for pie fillings. If necessary, press the pastry dough sheets together so that they are big enough to cover both the pumpkin pie and apple pie sections of the pan. Press the dough over the right side of pan so that it covers these two sections and goes up three of the walls. Trim away any overhang as necessary. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make walls of pastry dough.
steps.content: Make walls of pastry dough. Use a long strip of dough, stood on edge, to create a wall between the pie section and the rest of the pan. Press to seal it with the existing dough. In a similar fashion, use another strip of pastry to create a wall between the pumpkin and apple sections so the fillings don't combine. Press to seal. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add pie fillings to relevant sections.
steps.content: Add pie fillings to relevant sections. Spread the apple pie and pumpkin pie fillings in their respective sections. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make cheesecake section.
steps.content: Make cheesecake section. Create graham cracker walls around the cheesecake section, and line the bottom with graham crackers. Spread the cheesecake filling over top. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add the banana bread batter to final section.
steps.content: Add the banana bread batter to final section. Spread the banana bread batter in the last remaining section. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Bake for an hour in the preheated oven.
steps.content: Bake for an hour in the preheated oven. Transfer to a wire rack and leave to cool completely. [1] X Research source [4] X Research source

steps.title: Slice into squares.
steps.content: Slice into squares. Use a knife to slice into 32 squares (4 along the longer sides, 8 along the smaller sides). [1] X Research source
